'''Adepti Sigil''' is a Quest Item obtained after completing the [[Bygones Times Like Dust Passing]] Quest during the [[Archon Quest]] [[Interlude Chapter]]: Act I - [[The Crane Returns on the Wind]].

==Trivia==
*It bears the same symbols as the seals gating the entrances to Adepti abodes in [[Jueyun Karst]].
